message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11,000.
